name: Common Metadata Repository (CMR) / Earthdata CloudSTAC
description: CMR is a high-performance metadata system cataloging all data and service metadata records for NASA's Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS). It enables the discovery, access, and management of Earth observation data, supporting a variety of metadata standards including ISO 19115. The Earthdata CloudSTAC provides a SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog (STAC) API for these datasets.
